rows.label: qst700302_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, we're back.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0002
rows.name: We repaired the lanterns.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0003
rows.name:
Why did we have to do
such detailed work...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0004
rows.name:
Now, now, it's fine. The people of
the capital will surely be pleased.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0005
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0006
rows.name:
I'd been worried about them for
a while and wanted to fix them...
You've been a great help.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0007
rows.name: Hey, Chalced.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0008
rows.name: What is it, Nii-san?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0009
rows.name:
If you were worried about the
lanterns, you should have told me.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0010
rows.name:
...No, it's because I didn't
want to rely on you.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0011
rows.name:
Just because Mom isn't here,
you've been taking care of
me since we were little...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0012
rows.name:
Gahahaha! Chalced, do
you have a moment?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0013
rows.name: Squad Leader!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0014
rows.name:
Was I interrupting? Ah,
well, it should be fine.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0015
rows.name:
Chalced, you're promoted.
Come to my squad!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0016
rows.name: Sir? Why is that?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0017
rows.name:
Because you repaired the lanterns.
My squad has many subordinates,
but none of them noticed.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0018
rows.name:
It's proof that Chalced thinks
of the capital's residents first.
A talent my squad lacks.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0019
rows.name:
No, but... the ones who
actually repaired them
were these people here...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0020
rows.name:
Is that so? Then, I shall invite
these people to join my squad.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0021
rows.name: No, I refuse.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0022
rows.name: Hahaha, so blunt.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0023
rows.name:
We were the ones who repaired
them, but we would have left
them if not for his request.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0024
rows.name:
Chalced's initiative is
what should be praised.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0025
rows.name:
That's right, that's right!
The talented\are the ones
fit for my squad.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0026
rows.name: But, is this really okay?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0027
rows.name:
Haven't you been saying you
hated gate duty for a while?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0028
rows.name:
That's right. You shouldn't miss
out on this chance for promotion.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0029
rows.name: Nii-san, again...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0031
rows.name:
Squad Leader, I'll be in your
care. Please give me a mission
more difficult than gate duty!

rows.label: qst700302_msg0032
rows.name: Gahahaha! Leave it to me.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0033
rows.name:
I'm glad for you. Your
efforts paid off.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0034
rows.name: ...Yeah, good riddance.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0036
rows.name: Everyone, thank you.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0037
rows.name:
I never thought it would
turn out like this, but...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0038
rows.name:
It's thanks to all of you that
I was promoted. I thank you
from the bottom of my heart.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0039
rows.name: ...Are you sure about your brother?

rows.label: qst700302_msg0040
rows.name:
Yes. Getting a promotion was
one of my goals, after all.

rows.label: qst700302_msg0041
rows.name:
I see... Then I suppose
it's for the best...

rows.label: qst700302_msg0042
rows.name: Yes. Thank you so much!
